message.content:
cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT. 

The paper discusses random sampling and its application in processing and transmitting data, which falls under the category of databases (cs.DB) and data structures (cs.DS). The focus on queries that span multiple instances and the development of optimal unbiased estimators suggest a machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI) component. The mention of resource constraints on bandwidth or battery power also suggests an information theory (cs.IT) aspect.
